duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and audit all financials for each property monthly, including P&L/Balance sheet, bank statement, and property management report.
Prepare quarterly reporting for investors, including audit and report of financials every 90 days.
Manage accounts payable list and help make vendor payments when needed.
Work with Operations Team to forecast cashflow and maintain master budget per property.
Keep a detailed list of all company debts, including payment amounts, due dates, etc.
Assist the company in obtaining various credit cards, lines of credit, or other financial tools as needed.
Act as the primary contact for all 3rd party financial team members, including CPA, Bookkeeper, and Banking Rep.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
